data_path: <local file path> or <path to blob storage container> e.g. https://[storage_name].blob.core.windows.net/[container_name]/
location: <azure region where storage is created, e.g. 'westus2'>
resource_group: <resource group name where Storage and AI Search Services are Created>
search_service_name: <search service name to use or create> e.g. cog-search-pnh3sidy433ua
index_name: <index name to use or create> e.g. test-index
